item.description: @candace_leigh and The Tiger. Hope she doesn’t mind me sharing this, but it made my day :-)
How’s this for Christmas eve weather?
I am not very good at wrapping presents.
Please ignore that last tweet.
Still up?
Ice skating with @candace_leigh!
Crushing aluminum cans is fun!
I guess I’ll go to sleep now.
Listening to “Against The Wind” by Bob Seger (http://bit.ly/76WslJ) #pandora
I just started using Droplr, the coolest new app for Mac. Check it out at http://droplr.com
Just left the James Island Festival of Lights with @candace_leigh :-)
Organizing a semester’s worth of files in a folder on my desktop.
Also, I finally got my track pad fixed. 5 months of tapping to click was really annoying. It’ll time some time to get use to clicking again.
Despite my dislike of the Magic Mouse, I had a good experience at Apple King Street today. The new easy pay systems are ridiculously fast!
At ï£¿ King Street. My first experience with the Magic Mouse. I do not like it.
Tom Cruise is the best part of Tropic Thunder.
@annehjones sure thing! Let me know if you need any other help with it.
@annehjones congrats!
Something is wrong with this.
Everyone at Apple King Street is wearing a red shirt. I don’t know who to talk to.
Goodbye for now, Tigertown.
Three B’s so far. One more grade to go.
No, no. There are two o’s in Goose, boys.
I am done with school for the semester.
3 hours of sleep isn’t too bad.
I guess it wouldn’t be a proper exam week if I didn’t stay up all night working.
Yay for new TAPS shirts!
There is finally an IMDB app. Thank goodness.
I forgot how much fun people watching is.
I hope one day I get used to getting up at a reasonable hour.
I have a sheep doing roofing over at my house. Come and drop in. We’ll put on Zeppelin and eat cheddar cheese.
She and Him have announced that their second album will be coming out in March! Yay, Zooey!
Good afternoon, Internet. How are you today?
I am suffering from a government killer nano robot infection. Oh! And hotdog fingers. What should I do, @rainnwilson?
I am taking the night off. Well, compared to last night I am taking the night off.
I can’t remember the last time I had to be on campus at 8am. I guess I am spoiled.
Running out of time.
Yay! @candace_leigh made it home safely!
When I study for long periods of time, I start talking to myself. Is that bad?
In case any didn’t notice, C.J. Spiller touched the ball on every single play of that drive. Including the kickoff return.
Camped out in 313C Hendrix Student Center for the weekend. Lots of cramming ahead. No, not studying. Its way too late for studying.
I’m going to miss you, Mr. Monk.
I just turned in my last assignment of the semester. Yay?
Hats make my head itch.
That was one of the funniest The Office moments I have seen in a long time.
“I’m at the core of my life. Got no choice but to fight til it’s done.” -@johncmayer
A cable provider owning one of the biggest broadcast companies in the nation does not seem like a good idea to me.
There are some interesting books in the bottom of Cooper Library.
Hmm. Birdfeed has the ability to post photos to Flickr. Should I switch from Tweetie 2?
Apparently I am now playing “The Game.”
Watching the second to last Monk. Ever.
Time for some turkey.
Just bought @johncmayer’s new album. Review later.
Going home.
It amazes me how college students always think they deserve to make their breaks longer than they are suppose to be.
@annehjones I wonder if everyone enjoys these? Or just us media folk.
Yay for meteor showers with @candace_leigh!
RT @FakeAPStylebook: Never reveal that the true identity of Batman is Bruce Wayne.
Hey! I just saw @candace_leigh on TV! She looked pretty darn cute, too!
What makes this ketchup ‘fancy’?
Congrats, @taylorswift13!
Brother Micah is back in Clemson. Oh boy.
@diazap o kayyyy
@diazap I think you mention your computer more than @ajdphoto on Twitter. How does he feel about this?
I want these!!! I Wear My Suncontacts at Night http://gizmodo.com/5401364 #vision #transitioncontacts
Why do companies have extremely complicated product lines? Hasn’t Apple taught people anything?
Two streakers in Clemson ruined a perfectly good kiss for me tonight. I did not appreciate this.
3/3 people sitting next to me are using a Mac. If this were 5 years ago, those 3 people would be looking at me strangely for having a Mac.
Despite popular belief, I really enjoy getting up early. I just don’t like waking up part.
FSU photos. Enjoy, or don’t. - http://bit.ly/2GtUkt
Will someone want to buy me a D700?
@tigernewspaper we need to get you some more followers.
Being really bored and really lazy is a bad combination.
Remember, remember the 5th of November.
It’s amazing how after you get done with two tests in one day you feel a lot less stressed and frustrated.
Yankees are up by 4 and Mo just came in. I think this one might be over.
When I start eating Mike and Ikes I can’t stop.
Service http://flic.kr/p/7d44QN
I had to turn off SMS updates for @cnnbrk. I don’t care who New Jersey’s governor is or who Charlotte’s mayor is.
I am officially registered for my last 15 hours of college. Cool?
I think it is a good sign that you are in a hurry when you grab a bag of candy instead of your lunch.
As much as I want the Yankees to win, it would suck if they won in Philly.
I just registered for classes for the last time. I’m not sure how I feel about this.
I can’t wait for @candace_leigh to get home. I hope she enjoys my surprise :-)
Now that the game is over, I can get some work done.
I love the sounds Tweetie 2 makes. I keep refreshing so I can hear them :-)
@diazap I didn’t need to be spending money on something I didn’t need.
I finally bought Tweetie 2. Looks pretty nice.
Homecoming 2009 Photos - http://bit.ly/3Mx85x
I just found a remote control in my camera bag. I guess it has been a while since I’ve used it.
Oops. 5/5 included today.
4/4 rainy gamedays. I say we make it 7/7.
Is it Friday night? It sure feels like it.
I have a problem. I am obsessed with Helvetica.
I hate not being able to sleep.
@diazap welcome back.
I’m afraid Rachel has been replaced by an unnamed D90. Sorry.
Help #CJSpiller get to NYC!!! Vote here: http://promo.espn.go.com/espn/contests/theheismanvote/2009/index (via @CJ4Heisman)
Back in full photog mode. I missed it.
I am a little pissed off at Clemson right now.
Let the judgement being. I just bought @taylorswift13’s new album.
I am now a Tiger Band AND Clemson Fencing groupie. I am okay with this.
I am guilty of the same behavior, but why do we all wish for “tomorrow” to come and yet we dread “another week?”
It’s weird to think about how foreign and big Clemson’s campus is to some people.
Pet peeve as a photographer: People who refuse to walk in front of my camera when I am looking through it.
@diazap O kayyy
Goodnight cruel world.
I think I need a Frosty.
Photos from Tiger Open - http://bit.ly/3jetJb
It’s official. I love Dollhouse.
Chicken bog!
I’m gellin'
I just realized that there are only 5 more weeks of classes left this semester. Wow.
Aren’t Fridays awesome?
I love a good Jim and Dwight prank!
Lightroom 3 Beta just came out. Good thing I just upgraded to Lightroom 2 on Tuesday.
I think it is very ironic that I received a fraud alert for my MobileMe subscription on a credit card that I got from Apple.
@candace_leigh :-) http://flic.kr/p/79pFMx
Eating lunch and watching Dollhouse on Hulu.
The Office won’t stop playing on TBS! I can’t stop watching!
Confession: I like Vienna Sausages. I eat them with saltine crackers as a snack. Its delicious.
Just ordered some photo equipment for @tapsyearbook. Nikon D90, Nikon 18-200, Nikon SB-600, and a Sandisk 8GB SD card.
@mattmoose sounds good.
@mattmoose should i get the D90 with the 18-105 or pay a little more and get the 18-200 for TAPS?
Today is a big day for consumer electronics. Apple releases 3 new computers and Canon releases the 1D Mark IV. I still think the D3s wins.
My parents have been married for 30 years today! Go, @kjincharleston and Dad!
Picking camera equipment to buy is hard to do.
People who don’t follow instructions annoy me.
67 degrees in my apartment. Time to turn the heat on for the first time this year.
Go Tiger Band!
It saddens me that they play so much music over the PA.
Here comes the rain.
Finally in the lower deck.
Headed to the game. Hopefully the rain will hold off.
Wow. A 40 minute half. High school football games are shorter than I remember!
Sitting in the band room. Laughing at myself.
What should I listen to for my trip?
On my way to Lexington. Go Catband!
Watching Dollhouse. I didn’t realize it was back. Good thing someone invented the Internet!
My ECE classes are starting to overlap. In other words, I am being taught something again and it is very boring.
I hate how after a trip nothing is in the right place.
Leaving “The Armpit,” stopping at Rushs on the way out. Sorry, @jasonmjordan06.
On my way back to Clemson. Stopped in Columbia so @candace_leigh can see a friend. I hate this town.
@diazap glad you made it there okay! Why didn’t you tell me you were on flight number 42?
Time for a haircut.
http://jmjordan.com is new and live. check it out
@diazap I am going to need more twitpics. Have a good trip, though!
Watching Star Wars IV: A New Hope and playing with Google Chrome for Mac. In other words, I am enjoying my fall break.
@diazap is that similar to the McDonalds lady and the okaaaayyy.
@jasonmjordan06 I should probably pull for an NL team but I hate all of them. Except maybe the Rockies. Oh well.
Well since my Cubs didn’t make it to the playoffs (probably a good thing), I guess I’ll pull for the Yankees.
Fall break sunset.
Fall break.
Wait. Obama won the Nobel Peace Prize? Interesting. How does that thing work anyways?
Fall break starts in 12 hours.
Dinner = BBQ sliders, leftover sausage on a peice of bread, and left over hashbrowns.
I forgot that Jim and Pam are getting married tonight. That’s exciting I guess. Where are they going to go now?
Marvin is back up and running.
My professor gave us an extra on a programming assignment. I don’t think I am going to use the extra day like he intended.
Zeroing out one’s data is a terrifying experience. Good thing I have two backup’s to keep me at ease.
I just deleted of 300GB of data from my Mac Pro. I hope none of it was important.
Man. I really want to erase and install Snow Leopard.
Just changed my Clemson password for the last time. Bittersweet? Yes.
I’ve got my lunch packed up, my boots tied tight. I hope I don’t get in a fight. Oooohhhh, back to school.
Opps, http://bit.ly/3EdzGX. That should work. She is the one in the orange socks, duh.
My favorite Clemson fencer! http://bit.ly/14E3ic
Tonight must be cameo night on SNL. First Scarlett Johansson, now Madonna.
I need a frosty and some chicken nuggets.
Clothes washed. Car washed. Dishes cleaned. Bathroom cleaned. Apartment cleaned. I think that’s enough cleaning/washing for one day.
A pocket full of quarters means one thing. Laundry day. Except today it also means Raquel is getting a wash.
Seriously, Regal Entertainment Group? Student tickets are not available on the weekends? Lame!
On a hot date with @candace_leigh. Well, a hot date for two busy college students that is.
Thanks to the Corner Stop employee for opening the store so I could get my sunflower seeds for the night. I felt very adult at that moment.
Two tests down, one to go. One A so far, too!
I just dropped a class for the first time in my college career. I figure, I have 10 W hours I might as well use them, right?
The Office always cheers me up. That and @candace_leigh :-)
I hate this time of year. Why should I need a jacket in the morning when it’s 80 degrees in the afternoon?
iPhone = off.
I just realized that 3 hours of class takes up 6 hours of my day. Something is very wrong about that.
@diazap :-) You are welcome!
@diazap I guess I was just trying to hint at a shout out.
@diazap -cough cough- are you sticking with this shuffle this time?
Natalie lived in South Carolina at one point! Monk is awesome.
There is a Monk bobblehead app!
I can MMS now. Yay?
I take back my previous tweet. Mail is acting up and I think it’s because I spoke poorly of MMS. I’m sorry, AT&T.
I’m waiting for MMS, AT&T. I’m not sure why since I can just send email to everyone. When are we getting tethering, though?
I just found this out, by accident, but a clip from the Clemson - GA Tech game inspired a pretty funny segment on @aots.
I feel bad for the vendors in The Canteen who aren’t Chick fil a.
Holy moly! It feels good outside.
Woah. The Sun.
@katierip isn’t it lame how much class gets in the way of getting stuff done?
I haven’t seen the sun in about 5 days. On a happy note, though. Mark Martin won yesterday! Maybe he will finally win it all.
This weather is not very conducive to writing a paper.
Excuse me, they are only in 2nd place, but they are 10 games back.
Hey, the Cubs are playing on Fox. I’ll get to see them play before they end their season in like 4th place.
Lens hood is now permently affixed to the lens. I’m ready for the game now.
My computer thinks Inside Clemson emails are junk. I agree.
It’s a rainy day in Tigertown.
Wow. The Jay Leno show looks awfully familiar.
Someone over-estimated how many times they could press snooze this morning.
Russell Brand making fun of Megan Fox FTW!
Woah. That Lady Gaga performance was intense. #vma
Darn you, Rite Aid, for being closed and forcing me to go to Walgreens!
I’m such a bum. Poop.
Watching some fencing videos on in the Internets.
I guess I will finally start my day.
Getting out of class 10 minutes early might be the best thing ever. Well, besides having class cancelled.
The first time I wear jeans in the fall is always strange feeling.
Programming assignment submitted. Only 30 minutes late. Good thing I get an 8-hour grace period.
I don’t care about the IBM halftime report. I want to see Tiger Band!
I am not prepared for this chilly weather.
Ooo, iTunes 9. You are shiny!
I’m glad I haven’t spent too much time organizing the apps on my iPhone.
I think ‘Billie Jean’ is my favorite Michael Jackson song.
Today must be household chores day. On a side note. A pot holder makes a good sleeve for an ice pack to ice an ankle.
Laundry = done.
Laundry time!
@diazap oh man. Travis is making me look like a terrible friend. Two visits in two months. Jeez.
My english prof. getting a migraine could not have come at a better time. Sorry, Swords…
@diazap I just helped her dye her hair.
I’ll have a new girlfriend in about an hour.
telnet is a pretty handy little application when doing socket programming.
@diazap you would make a bad engineer.
@diazap how long did you wait?
Good job, @candace_leigh and Tiger Band!
This is going to get ugly. Touchdown on the first play.
The calm before the storm is upon Clemson.
The CAT bus in the parade always make me laugh.
Waiting for the First Friday parade to begin so Rachel and I can have some fun!
Oh boy. Pre-gameday traffic has arrived. I guess it’s time for gridlock everywhere in Clemson.
Yay! iStat Menus now works with Snow Leopard, and the new version is a lot better!
I think I would have been better off not going to class today. Oh well.
Trailers full of portajohns and referees at the stadium. Is something happening that I’m not aware of?
Waking to President Barker’s house for “dinner.”
I don’t know how my dad wore a suit to work everyday for 20 years.
VH1, you disappoint me. You have included Mily Cyrus in your “Divas” show. Really?!
Is it just me or does the Beatles Rockband idea sound really boring?
@diazap I am already up and out. I don’t want to do that over again.
Thanks to http://bit.ly/25hndu, I got Logitech Control Center to work with Snow Leopard. Yes!
Megan Parker, the girl that aparently lived in my apartment before me, ordered a lot of catalogs.
@candace_leigh :-) http://flic.kr/p/6U9Jwy
-collapses on bed-
@diazap one of the don’ts of Twitter in the paper this week was linking Twitter and facebook.
Introducing people to Rush’s.
At Waffle House in Lexington (sort of).
So this is what pre-dawn looks like.
Hmm. Lots of things aren’t working in Snow Leopard that I depend on. iStat Menus, Logitech Control Center…
3 iMacs and a Mac Pro does in fact fit into a Honda Accord. Good to know.
Happy birthday, @diazap.
Being in a meeting from 3:30 to 9pm is not as fun as it sounds.
There is a booming voice in the sky. I hope that isn’t who I think it is…
@diazap I wish I could…
@diazap such is the life of an engineering student I guess.
Something I hate more than not being able to sleep: waking up at the same time you need to leave for class. Esp. when you have something due
I hate not being able to sleep.
My steady diet of sunflower seeds has officially begun.
I’m not feeling this whole class thing right now.
Good morning, world!
@diazap it was really great to talk tonight. I have really missed that. :-)
I am in need of some comfort food. Zaxbys should do the trick.
Not again…
Yay for Tiger Band practice being cancelled!
Watching the race. Eating dinner.
me and @candace_leigh = 1 month :-)
It’s the weekend!
Friday!!!
Something is not right in the world. There are girls with sorority shirts taking classes on the second floor of Riggs.
I love CpE classes. The one I am in right now only has 10 people.
Clemson remains at 22 in U.S. News rankings. So much for getting into the top 20 before I graduate.
My second to last first day is over. It was one of the best first days I have had yet.
I think its time to starting using the GTD philosophy.
On a CAT Bus starting my second to last first day of classes.
Thanks for the speghetti sauce, @kjincharleston. @candace_leigh and I enjoyed it very much.
At a meeting for block seating. Student Media are block seating virgins.
At Tiger Band practice.
Picked up my parking permit. They have successful prevented me from parking illegally. Good job.
I finally get to see (500) Days of Summer! Plus, I get to see it with @candace_leigh, even better!
I just realized that my contact lenses have numbers etched on them.
My favorite piccolo player :-) http://flic.kr/p/6PVZzx
Flickr
Getting out of bed for the second time today. This time it’s for good.
The freshman have arrived.
What’s the best way to wash a leather watch strap?
My first piece of mail at my new apartment is a movie starring my favorite actress!
Shower time!
@diazap I was just told that I am just being used to drive a certain someone to band camp. Oh well. I like it.
Have fun at band camp, @candace_leigh!
Hmm. Burger King at Hendrix. The school has officially begun.
The aforementioned activity is the perfect end to and awesome day.
Cookies and milk time.
@candace_leigh is in Clemson! :-)
Oh boy. I am suddenly very nervous.
Uh oh. Zack just got dumped by Kelly 4 hours before the prom. What’s he going to do?!
12 hours until @candace_leigh arrives in Tigertown! :-) Can you tell I’m excited?
I am officially moved into my apartment thanks to @kjincharleston (mom).
At one of my least favorite places. Walmart.
Yay! Internets!!!
I am really excited. @candace_leigh will be in Clemson in less than 24 hours!!!
@candace_leigh 36 hours!!!
Abby from ER is coming back to NBC. Woohoo!
In bed, talking to @candace_leigh.
It’s Sunday in Clemson. Time for a Thickburger.
@moorepatrick Where did you see it?
Go Holy Name Cadets!
@yeaguy Wish I could be there. Go HNC!
Actually I take that back. It is amazing how much faster your internet seems when you use opendns.
I think the person I am borrowing internet from turned on QOS or something for wireless.
I really wish the celebrities I follow would stop telling me to go see (500) Days of Summer. I WANT TO, BUT IT ISN’T PLAYING WHERE I AM!!!
Monk!!!
Mandy and Raquel have the same check engine light code. Hmm…
The photo of the iMac on the side of the iMac box doesn’t have a power cord, yet the iMac is on. Hmm..
The last season of Monk starts tonight :-(
should not leave his twitter open.
is Mick Jagger.
box o’ kittens.
chasing chickens.
stalking old people.
punching premature babies.
Helping make a new logo for Clemson Student Media.
@diazap :-/
Getting dinner at the improved Clemson Zaxby’s.
Thanks for all the help, @jasonmjordan06! I couldn’t have done it without you.
I am done moving my stuff to my new apartment. Now I get to unpack. That is the easy part, though.
About to finish moving into my apartment.
@diazap very nice!
About to take my first shower in my new apartment.
I’ve missed people watching from the TAPS office.
Back in Clemson. Since I don’t have a home yet, I guess I’ll go to my other home. Hendrix.
Moving back to Clemson for the last time…
@diazap I didn’t see that you called. My phone gets terrible reception in my house.
Had a great “going away” BBQ with some of my favorite people.
Goodbye, says the Mac Pro.
Going to get some furniture from the beach for my new apartment. Yup.
My 36 hour trip to Nashville is nearly complete.
There’s something on the wing. Some thing on the wing…
I am 90% sure I just saw Geraldo Rivera getting his shoes shined in the Nashville airport.
Ok correction. I am in Nashville not Knoxville. There are too many ‘villes in Tenn.
I have arrived in Knoxville.
I just heard the worst saftey demonstration I have ever heard on a plane. She sounded like she really hated her life. Should’ve recorded it
Flight attendant just said they don’t recognize airplane mode on cell phones. Umm. False.
Yay for free wifi in Charlotte!
Hello, Charlotte.
I like having a girlfriend to drop me off at the airport :-)
Goodbye, SPAWAR.
Okay. Who would like to buy me the new Nikon 70-200 F/2.8?
Just getting to bed. Last day of work + flight to Tenn. = busy day tomorrow.
Farewell lunch. Check. Desk cleaned off. Check. Almost there…
Welcome back to F1, Schumi!
I will be done with work in 24 hours. Yay! and :-(
@kathrynglass okay, deal.
@kathrynglass well dont get too excited, we haven’t posted anything yet. perhaps I will start this weekend when megan and i go to tenn.
@kathrynglass you should follow TAPS at @tapsyearbook
@kathrynglass That is nifty. I wouldn’t mind using that on projects.
@kathrynglass Very nice. What are you using to do that slide show?
Good morning, all!
@diazap :-(
If AT&T hadn’t supposedly block 4chan today I wouldn’t have known what that was.
I just had a very serious ‘Office Space’ moment. I just received the same email from 3 people…
I retract my previous tweet. Not only was it grammatically incorrect, but the aforementioned movie is playing in Anderson Aug. 12 & 13 :-)
I wish (500) Days of Summer were playing in Charleston before I leave for Clemson…
@diazap Um excuse me? I camped out for 12 hours for that store to open, so that 24 hour period was kind of a blur to me.
Oops, Apple Store King Street turned one yesterday. My bad.
Happy 1st birthday Apple Store King Street!
Taking a “smoke” break by myself isn’t as fun.
@kathrynglass Yay!
Last week of work. Here’s hoping it goes by quickly.
Cubs win! Back in first place!
People on Top Chef Masters are too nice to each other.
Date 1.0 was a smashing success.
@diazap Haha, no. It is for a catering event. Date involves walking the bridge then dinner. :-)
At Whole Foods in Mt. Pleasant picking up some edible flowers.
I am really excited about my date with a certain someone tonight!
Just decorated 50 Ginger bread cookies for @foodbyjason
@diazap you didn’t waste any time did you?
Hello, weekend.
Good morning, Internet!
Looking through boxes that have been in the attic is quite interesting. I was really thin in high school!
Does anyone know what is up with the Google homepage?
Just entered schedule for the fall into iCal.
Where are you ‘Overheard in the Office?’ You are one of the few things that get me through the day.
Just had fun at lunch with @candace_leigh. Pretending was not so fun…
Oh my goodness. Today is going to be interesting…
Its like Christmas in my cube today!
Wow. That is all I have to say.
Aparently I am smitten. Okay. I am okay with that.
@kathrynglass I am going to say classic rock.
@kathrynglass Good! I am excited, too! We got a lot done this weekend that should help us when everyone gets back.
@kathrynglass Sounds fun. I am going to Clemson in two weeks to move in and work on TAPS stuff.
@kathrynglass Are you moving straight to Clemson or will you be doing something before classes start?
Running late for work. Good thing it’s Monday.
Had a good weekend in Clemson. Got a lot done for TAPS. Deadlines set. Layouts well underway. Glad to be back in my own bed, though.
Back: Is shopping online for a piccolo =] in Charleston. Thanks for making my trip a breeze, @eloiechthroi.
French Canadian bikers.
At the rest stop on I385… with some French Canadians.
Welcome, @eloiechthroi!
Tigertown bound. In Ltown now.
@kathrynglass That’s why you are suppose to use Safari.
@kathrynglass this is true…
@kathrynglass Because it is an evil, evil application.
@diazap Tell him he is expected at work tomorrow. Galavanting in Chicago is not allowed.
About to go see ‘Moon’ with Candace.
@kathrynglass What is it doing?
Sad day. http://bit.ly/de9aZ Huffpost - Willis Tower Becomes Official: Sears Tower Renamed
Trip to lunch w/ AC: 21mpg. Trip from lunch w/o AC: 28mpg. I think I am on to something. Be miserable, save money.
My car got 17mpg on the way to work. I need to improve this.
@kathrynglass Woah, Flight Deck! I haven’t been there in forever. I remember when it was across the street in the that little shopping area.
Taking a half-sick day.
Has anyone seen the preview for ‘Moon?’ Woah! I need to see this!
@katierip I’m still not really sure how it works, oh well.
Can someone please explain how the Tour de France works? Or point me to somewhere that explains it.
Lou Piniella is a maniac.
Cubs and Cards on ESPN.
Boo for the ï£¿ King Street being closed. I need to take my MacBook in to be fixed…
Way to go, Mark!
Freedom of the press is limited to those who own one. - A. J. Liebling
Zooey. -sigh-
Apple Store King Street is closed until further notice. http://bit.ly/SyUc2
Woah! My watch is 15 minutes slow. Its time for lunch!
Well, I caved. I just bought a Michael Jackson album. Thriller.
4 inches of rain in an hour also = ï£¿ King Street being flooded.
4 inches of rain in an hour = flooded garage.
I am here ->
Lance Armstrong is in the Tour de France again?!?!
Voeckler wins Tour 5th stage; Armstrong still 2nd http://bit.ly/i7KSF
Kernel Panic = #virtualboxfail
Fireworks!
@kathrynglass I agree. Hilarious!
Watching The Cubs take on The Brewers. I wish I could be there…
@diazap yes. Unfortunately.
Off to see a man about a trackpad.
@diazap because fireworks are awesome anytime.
Friday at The ‘Joe http://flic.kr/p/6BCWxn
Mitt Romney must be extremely happy right now. First Sanford is gone, now Palin.
@diazap Um, Apple will be fixing my trackpad. Or they will be giving me a new MacBook.
@diazap My trackpad won’t click.
Just made an appointment with a Genius. Not very happy about it.
Autostitch might be my new favorite app.
@kathrynglass At least you don’t have have to put up with a train track in every direction like I do.
On the front page of The City Paper in Charleston: Appalachian Trail â Argentinean Tail. Plus a caricature of Mark Sanford in a dress.
How in the world do you mix-up a t and l? I don’t know, but I did. Oops. Sorry, Trukz.
